page.title: 02LEISURE CENTRE,BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: Barnstaple has a{Leisure Centre}which} was built on 8th Dec.1972 and cost Â£750,000 to build.It was opened by the Minister of sport Dennis Howell on the 14th June 1975 . The {Leisure {Centre }offers twenty activites, swimming is the most popular and snooker is the least.In the {Leisure {Centre}there are 27 staff .The pool holds 288,000 gallons of water. To fill the pool up it takes 2 days. There was a rubbish dump on the site before the {Leisure Centre }was built. It is owned by the North Devon council. It opens 10a.m.-10.30p.m. except for Sundays when it opens 9a.m. -5p.m. The {Leisure Centre} has benefitted by having an indoor pool. Some people believe the{Leisure {Centre}is too expensive a luxury for N.Devon. {
